All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class SneakyHoverFrog
extends HoverFrog

The class SneakyHoverFrog is a subclass of HoverFrog with the addition of the instance variable isSneaking and the accessors setIsSneaking() and getIsSneaking().

Version:
(14/01/2018)
Author:
(Remi Kik)
